name: Null G
description:
Welcome to Null G space station. A competitive and adaptive environment for flexible battle training. The Battle School creates peer to peer opposition in fast-paced combat training sims and solo training against rigorously designed AI drones. Team up or fly solo to win the advantage and take the stage. Think, Fight, Win.

Outmaneuver and outgun your opponents in competitive game modes.
Currently Available Multiplayer Games:
-Free For All
-Golden Snitch
Currently Available Singleplayer Games:
-Rogue Drones

More to come in future updates!
()_()
